actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill prohibiting use of Health, Education, and Welfare funds for abortion.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Prohibits the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare from furnishing, directly or indirectly, funds to pay for or encourage abortions, except where such abortions are necessary to save the life of a mother.

titles.title: A bill prohibiting use of Health, Education, and Welfare funds for abortion.
